name: Merry Christmas Games and Puzzles - Match candy for holiday songs and music
name_original: Merry Christmas Games and Puzzles - Match candy for holiday songs and music
description:
Help Santa match gifts so he can deliver on time for Christmas!

Key Features:
▶ MUCH easier than other matching games.
▶ Over 300 levels - with more added each week!
▶ Challenge friends and other players through Game Center.
▶ Unlock powerful items.
▶ Super cute characters.

Download for FREE! *Limited time only.*
